__e: I never understood why my brother brought trash into the palace.
- Because I dumped garbage into a river?
Just dumped her in a hole like she was a piece of garbage.
I saw it with my own eyes aboard the Rising Star, before I was cast out and put here among the Borays of humanity.
This is good stuff. This is the best garbage in town. This is primo.
I'd ask for a response, but I wouldn't want to taint myself with the vulgar refuse that must, even now, be flashing through your mind.
